message: Hi Guys, anyone knows about sentimental analysis of text? I am trying to learn more about that now, i found several resources using Python. But i am wondering, does anyone know nice easy to use python framework (something like scrapy for crawling) to make my life easier? does anyone know as well a nice tutorial?

data.message:
AFAIK, Sentiment analysis is not a one subject that you can find one framework doing all the jobs for you (like scraping or crawling).
Sentiment analysis is a combination of two major branches in computer science which are Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning. The later branch is also a branch of Artificial Intelligence branch.
For Natural Language processing in python you will find NLTK toolkit. 
For Machine learning there are two options, either scikit-learn or Spark-Mlib (the python version)
scikit-learn is much mature than spark-mlib but if you want to use machine learning techniques in a scalable way, go for Spark-mlib.
Hope that help
NLTK with Python 3 for Natural Language Processing: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQVvvaa0QuDf2JswnfiGkliBInZnIC4HL check this out
